No.11041/218/2007-Admn.     3rd  February 2011 
  
 
POLICY MATTERS: TECHNICAL (72/2011) 
[Decision taken in respect of Agenda Item No.2 of  
63 rd  Meeting of the Executive Committee held on 23.1.20 11]  
  
  
Sub:   Ceiling on Variations / Change in Scope for BOT Contracts. 
  
  As per Model Concession Agreements, the concessio naire is entitled 
to nullify any change of Scope Order if it causes t he cumulative cost 
relating to all Change of Scope Orders to exceed 5%  (Five per cent) of the 
Total Project Cost in any continuous period of 3 (T hree) years immediately 
preceding the date of such Change of Scope Order or  if such cumulative 
cost exceed 20% (Twenty per cent) of the Total Proj ect Cost at any time 
during the Concession Period.  Hence, any additiona l expenditure even 
upto 5% (Five per cent) limit has to be approved wi th extreme caution.  
 
2. Henceforth, for all proposals of Variations / Ch ange in Scope for BOT 
Contracts, PDs and ROs must certify after personal verification that 
proposals are; “ absolutely essential and unavoidable in public inte rest”.  
             
3.         The above decision of the Executive Comm ittee is circulated for 
strict compliance. 
  
  
 
(M. Chandrashekhar) 
General Manager (Coord.)
